General.Name: Shanghai Film Co Ltd
General.Description: Shanghai Film Co., Ltd. engages in film distribution and screening activities in China. It is also involved in the operation and sale of copyrights; and provision of online ticketing and membership services, as well as investment, development, and operation of cinemas and cultural facilities. The company was formerly known as Shanghai Oriental Television Distribution Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shanghai Film Co., Ltd. in July 2012. Shanghai Film Co., Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is based in Shanghai, China. Shanghai Film Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Shanghai Film (Group) Co., Ltd.
